mapper.select: SELECT id, username, password, salt, FULL_NAME, birthday, sex, icon, email, phone, address, status, sort, district, remarks FROM t_base_user WHERE username = #{username}

SELECT a.* FROM t_base_user a JOIN t_base_org_user b ON a.id = b.user_id JOIN t_base_org c ON c.id = b.org_id
WHERE c.id = #{orgId}

SELECT a.* FROM t_base_user a JOIN t_base_org_user b ON a.id = b.user_id JOIN t_base_org c ON c.id = b.org_id
WHERE c.id = #{orgId}
and a.username like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{username}), '%')
and a.FULL_NAME like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{fullName}), '%')
SELECT a.* FROM t_base_user a JOIN t_base_user_role b ON a.id = b.user_id JOIN t_base_role c ON c.id = b.role_id WHERE c.id = #{roleId}

SELECT a.* FROM t_base_user a JOIN t_base_org_user b ON a.id = b.user_id JOIN t_base_org c ON c.id = b.org_id JOIN t_base_user_role d ON a.id = d.user_id JOIN t_base_role e ON e.id = d.role_id WHERE c.id = #{orgId} AND e.CODE = #{roleCode}
